description: Server-side JavaScript code implementing an Express.js application for visualizing and managing multiple database connections (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB), including environment variable loading, database adapters, connection testing, and API endpoints.

classes.name: DatabaseAdapter
classes.description: Abstract base class for database adapters, providing interface methods for testing connection, retrieving tables, and fetching data.

classes.name: SQLAdapter
classes.description: Abstract class extending DatabaseAdapter for SQL-based databases, implementing common methods for executing queries and retrieving table info.

classes.name: PostgresAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for PostgreSQL, implementing execute, getTableQuery, and getDataQuery methods.

classes.name: MySQLAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for MySQL, implementing execute, getTableQuery, and getDataQuery methods.

classes.name: SQLiteAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for SQLite, implementing execute, getTableQuery, and getDataQuery methods.

classes.name: MongoDBAdapter
classes.description: Adapter for MongoDB, implementing connection, getTables, and getData methods.

methods.name: loadEnvFiles
methods.description: Loads environment variables from .env files for different database types.

methods.name: testConnections
methods.description: Tests connections to configured databases and returns list of successful ones.

methods.name: handleApiRequest
methods.description: Generic handler for API requests, executing database operations and returning JSON responses.
